## AsyncTapHook.tapAsync() method

listen to hook in async callback mode

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
tapAsync(fn: IAsyncTapCallback<T, R>, bucket?: IHookBucketType): ITapDestroy;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fn | <code>IAsyncTapCallback&lt;T, R&gt;</code> | Listener callback The last argument of <code>fn</code> which named <code>cb</code> will be a function which signature is <code>(err?: Error, result?: T) =&gt; void</code>. When error occur, pass the error to <code>cb</code> as first param and the <code>result</code> param should be void, Otherwise, first param must be void. |
|  bucket | <code>IHookBucketType</code> | Listen to specified hashcode bucket |

<b>Returns:</b>

`ITapDestroy`

The unTap function
